name: A Road More Travelled
description:
An open-world, action-adventure game slice focusing on player exploration and visual effects. This project was designed and developed by two university students as a final piece.

This game is by no means perfect and we had some issues with the packaged project that don't appear in the editor so if there are any bugs we apologise! However, this game is sixteen-weeks of trial and error and we hope you enjoy it :) 

Team:

Becky Reeve (https://bexilou12.itch.io/) 

  • Developer
  • User Interfaces
  • Quest and Skill System Programmer
  • AI Programmer

Chloe Gooda (https://chloegooda.itch.io/)

  • Developer
  • Technical Artist
  • Save/Load System
  • Animation and Audio Programmer
